long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Update: Sorry all, but I must decommission the server hosting this service. The code below is open source, and isn't too bad to host on your own. There is seemingly no way for me to remove this extension from my developer account, but please uninstall this extension.

Shows win/lose stats for competitors on Saltybet from a free database.

You must be logged in for these stats to show.

Source code is available here:
https://github.com/mrmoss/saltybet_tools_chrome_extension
